name: Matrix Neo Unreal Engine 5
description:
I felt an inner need to make Neo from Matrix as playable character in the Unreal Engine Big City Demo as it realeased.

Low FPS and glitches happen because the matrix runs on an old 16core CPU :P

Neo now can fight, fly fast...very fast, use telekinetics and use Matrix Settings... Disclaimer: NO HUMAN BEEINGS ARE HARMED, BECAUSE EVERYBODY IN THIS DEMO IS COMPUTER GENERATED! Big thanks to EPIC Games for everything that they do, making dreams come true.

It took a lot of time and effort to figure out how to merge different assets from the Unreal Engine Marketplace and make it not look wonky.  But with some nice sound effects the result seems pretty good.

Even on high end hardware dont expect to run the demo stable 60fps.
Also for it seems like the big city demo was not built for ultra fast flight speeds :D

Assets used(was by no means easy to merge):

- Big City Sample by EPIC Games
- https://www.unrealengine.com/marketpl...
- https://www.unrealengine.com/marketpl...

Neo model is a mix of Twinblade Model by Epic and Johnny Silverhand from Cyberpunk 2077 The Hair I groomed myself^^'

Enjoy
